sig_info: Attacks that deal Energy Damage cause Ultron to Regenerate 20 to 65.95% of the damage dealt to him. Each Energy-based attack also grants Ultron a burst of Power based on the damage dealt.
Incoming Incinerate and Shock effects suffer -20 to 75% Duration.

ALWAYS ACTIVE: Advanced robotics causes Ultron’s Function abilities to have a 100% chance to trigger and to be unaffected by Ability Accuracy. Additionally, Ultron is Immune to Bleed, Poison and Slow effects.
Function (Evade) - Every 7 seconds, Evade all incoming attacks for 1.5 second(s).
WHEN HEALTH DROPS BELOW 50% AND 25%: Function (Heal) - Once Per Fight - Gain a Self-Repair Buff healing 296.5 Health over 10 seconds. If Stunned while Self Repair is active, Connection is Lost and the Self-Repair is removed.
ALL ATTACKS: Function (Critical) - Every 5th attack is a guaranteed Critical Hit.
Function (Damage) - Every 3rd attack inflicts a Bleed Debuff, causing 49.8 direct damage over 6 seconds. If the target is Mutant, instead inflict a matching Degeneration Debuff.
BLOCKING: Function (Armor) - Every 4th Blocked attack grants an Armor Up Buff, providing +282.35 Armor Rating for 30 seconds. Well-Timed Blocks count as 4 Blocked attacks for this purpose.
HEAVY ATTACKS: Triggers Function (Damage) for each unique Function Ultron has utilized during the fight. Cooldown: 5 seconds per unique Function utilized during the fight.
LAUNCH A SPECIAL ATTACK: Function (Cauterize) - Remove all effects from the opponent caused by Ultron’s Function (Damage). Gain +41.5 Attack Rating for each effect removed this way for the duration of the Special Attack.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: Function (Stun) - Inflict a Stun Debuff lasting 2 seconds.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: The attack bonus granted by Function (Cauterize) lingers for 10 seconds after this attack is finished.
Any Function (Damage) Debuffs triggered during this attack are doubled.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: Function (Stun) - Inflict a Stun Debuff lasting 3.50 seconds.
Function (Burn) - Inflicts Power Burn, draining 2 bar(s) of Power and dealing direct damage proportional to the Power Drained.
PASSIVE: Duckslug Editorial
Ultron Prime enters an evade state 7 seconds after the fight starts, lasting 0.4 seconds. He will not evade while stunned.
This state is refreshed after 7 seconds.
He can evade multiple attacks while in this state.

ALWAYS ACTIVE: Advanced robotics causes Ultron’s Function abilities to have a 100% chance to trigger and to be unaffected by Ability Accuracy. Additionally, Ultron is Immune to Bleed, Poison and Slow effects.
Function (Evade) - Every 7 seconds, Evade all incoming attacks for 1.5 second(s).
WHEN HEALTH DROPS BELOW 50% AND 25%: Function (Heal) - Once Per Fight - Gain a Self-Repair Buff healing 3266 Health over 10 seconds. If Stunned while Self Repair is active, Connection is Lost and the Self-Repair is removed.
ALL ATTACKS: Function (Critical) - Every 5th attack is a guaranteed Critical Hit.
Function (Damage) - Every 3rd attack inflicts a Bleed Debuff, causing 548.4 direct damage over 6 seconds. If the target is Mutant, instead inflict a matching Degeneration Debuff.
BLOCKING: Function (Armor) - Every 4th Blocked attack grants an Armor Up Buff, providing +344.12 Armor Rating for 30 seconds. Well-Timed Blocks count as 4 Blocked attacks for this purpose.
HEAVY ATTACKS: Triggers Function (Damage) for each unique Function Ultron has utilized during the fight. Cooldown: 5 seconds per unique Function utilized during the fight.
LAUNCH A SPECIAL ATTACK: Function (Cauterize) - Remove all effects from the opponent caused by Ultron’s Function (Damage). Gain +457 Attack Rating for each effect removed this way for the duration of the Special Attack.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: Function (Stun) - Inflict a Stun Debuff lasting 2 seconds.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: The attack bonus granted by Function (Cauterize) lingers for 10 seconds after this attack is finished.
Any Function (Damage) Debuffs triggered during this attack are doubled.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: Function (Stun) - Inflict a Stun Debuff lasting 3.50 seconds.
Function (Burn) - Inflicts Power Burn, draining 2 bar(s) of Power and dealing direct damage proportional to the Power Drained.
PASSIVE: Duckslug Editorial
Ultron Prime enters an evade state 7 seconds after the fight starts, lasting 0.4 seconds. He will not evade while stunned.
This state is refreshed after 7 seconds.
He can evade multiple attacks while in this state.
